__e: After how I've treated you, now I owe you my life.

And now I'm totally clean and sober, I have a good job, a good life, and I owe that all to you.

I'm safely in the office, and I have you to thank for it.
Everything I have I owe to you because we are one big family.

Everything I am, everything I shall ever be, I owe to you.

I have a lot to thank you for and I'm not unappreciative.
We should never doubt our fate. Thanks to you, I've met the man of my dreams.

I've owed him a lot, I will explain it now.
I mean, I owe him my life.

I owe them with my life if it comes to that.
